AT.name: Skylanders Imaginators
AT.description: Kaos hat die uralte Macht der Geist-Magie entdeckt und nutzt sie, um eine unaufhaltsame Armee von Doomlandern zu erschaffen! Eon ruft alle Portalmeister und die größten mystischen Krieger der Skylands, die Sensei, um Kaos aufzuhalten und die Kontrolle über die Geist-Magie zurückzuerlangen. Nutze die Macht deiner Phantasie, um deine eigenen Skylander für den Kampf im ultimativen Abenteuer zu erschaffen: die Rettung der Skylands an der Seite der allmächtigen Sensei. - Begib dich auf ein episches Abenteuer - Nutze die Imaginite-Kreationskristalle, um deine eigenen Skylander zu kreieren - Sensei-Skylander sind die ultimativen Meister der mächtigen Sky-Chi-Kräfte - Kämpfe um die Rettung der Skylands an der Seite der Sensei und Imaginator-Skylander - Nutze 10 verschiedene Kampfklassen, um Kaos und seine Schergen zu besiegen - Spiele mit Freunden im Koop-Modus und in Kopf-an-Kopf-Rennen - Meistere brandneue Nebenquests & Minispiele Dieser Titel kann nicht mit der Wii-Fernbedienung allein gespielt werden.

AU.name: Skylanders Imaginators
AU.description: Kaos has discovered the ancient power of Mind Magic and is using it to create an unstoppable army of Doomlanders! Eon is calling upon all Portal Masters and Skylands' greatest mystic warriors, the Senseis, to stop Kaos and regain control of the Mind Magic. Now, you must use the power of your imagination to create your own Skylanders to battle in the ultimate adventure alongside the almighty Senseis to save Skylands. -Embark on an Epic New Adventure -Use the Imaginite Creation Crystals to Create Your Own Skylanders -Sensei Skylanders are the Ultimate Masters of the Almighty Sky-Chi Powers -Battle to Save Skylands with the Sensei and Imaginator Skylanders -Use 10 Different Battle Class Types to Defeat Kaos and his Minions -Play With Friends in COOP and Head-to-Head Racing -Conquer All-New Side quests & Mini-games This title cannot be played with the Wii Remote™ only.

BG.name: Skylanders Imaginators
BG.description: Kaos has discovered the ancient power of Mind Magic and is using it to create an unstoppable army of Doomlanders! Eon is calling upon all Portal Masters and Skylands' greatest mystic warriors, the Senseis, to stop Kaos and regain control of the Mind Magic. Now, you must use the power of your imagination to create your own Skylanders to battle in the ultimate adventure alongside the almighty Senseis to save Skylands. -Embark on an Epic New Adventure -Use the Imaginite Creation Crystals to Create Your Own Skylanders -Sensei Skylanders are the Ultimate Masters of the Almighty Sky-Chi Powers -Battle to Save Skylands with the Sensei and Imaginator Skylanders -Use 10 Different Battle Class Types to Defeat Kaos and his Minions -Play With Friends in COOP and Head-to-Head Racing -Conquer All-New Side quests & Mini-games This title cannot be played with the Wii Remote™ only.

BE.name: Skylanders Imaginators
BE.description: Kaos a découvert l'ancien pouvoir de la magie de l'Esprit et il s'en sert pour créer une armée de Doomlanders ! Eon fait appel à tous les Maîtres du portail et aux plus grands guerriers mystiques des Skylands, les Sensei, pour arrêter Kaos et ses sbires ! Tu dois maintenant utiliser le pouvoir de ton imagination pour créer tes propres Skylanders qui iront participer à cette aventure ultime aux côtés des Sensei pour sauver les Skylands. - Lance-toi dans une nouvelle aventure épique - Utilise les cristaux de création en Imaginite pour créer tes propres Skylanders - Les Skylanders Sensei sont les maîtres ultimes des puissants pouvoirs Sky-Chi - Combats pour sauver les Skylands avec les Sensei et le Skylanders Imaginators - Utilise 10 Classes de combat différentes pour vaincre Kaos et ses Sbires - Joue avec tes amis en mode coopératif et lors de courses en face-à-face - Triomphe des nouvelles quêtes secondaires & des mini-jeux Utilisée seule, la télécommande Wii ne permet pas de jouer.

ES.name: Skylanders Imaginators
ES.description: ¡Kaos ha descubierto el antiguo poder de la Magia mental y está usándolo para crear un ejército imparable de Doomlanders! Eon está invocando a todos los Maestros del Portal y a los Senseis, los guerreros místicos más grandes de Skylands, para detener a Kaos y a sus esbirros. Ahora debes usar el poder de tu imaginación para crear tus propios Skylanders y combatir junto a los todopoderosos Senseis en la aventura definitiva para salvar Skylands. - Embárcate en una nueva y épica aventura. - Usa los Creation Crystals de Imaginite para crear tus propios Skylanders. - Los Skylanders Senseis son los maestros supremos de los increíbles poderes del Sky-Chi. - Lucha para salvar Skylands con los Skylanders Senseis e Imaginators. - Usa 10 tipos de clase de batalla para derrotar a Kaos y a sus secuaces. - Juega con tus amigos en COOPERATIVO y en carreras cara a cara. - Supera nuevas misiones secundarias y minijuegos. No se puede jugar a este título de Wii únicamente con un mando de Wii.

IT.name: Skylanders Imaginators
IT.description: Kaos ha scoperto l'antico potere della Magia Mentale e lo sta usando per creare un inarrestabile esercito di Doomlanders! Per fermarlo e riacquistare il controllo della Magia Mentale, Eon ha chiamato alle armi tutti i Padroni dei Portali e i più grandi guerrieri mistici delle Skylands, i Sensei. Usa il potere della tua immaginazione per creare Skylanders personalizzati e combatti per difendere le Skylands al fianco dei potentissimi Sensei. - Affronta una nuova avventura di proporzioni epiche - Usa i Cristalli creazione Imaginite per creare i tuoi Skylanders personalizzati - Gli Skylanders Sensei sono i maestri assoluti dei prodigiosi poteri dello Sky-Chi - Combatti per salvare le Skylands con Skylanders Sensei e Imaginators - Usa 10 diverse Classi di combattimento per sconfiggere Kaos e i suoi scagnozzi - Gioca con gli amici in modalità Cooperativa e Gare testa a testa - Completa nuove missioni secondarie e originali minigiochi Non è possibile giocare a questo titolo usando solo il telecomando Wii.

NL.name: Skylanders Imaginators
NL.description: Kaos heeft de eeuwenoude breinmagie ontdekt en hij gebruikt het om een onoverwinnelijk leger Doomlanders mee op te bouwen! Eon roept alle Poortmeesters en de grote mystieke krijgers van Skylands, de Senseis, op om Kaos tegen te houden en de breinmagie terug te veroveren. Jij moet nu met de kracht van je verbeelding je eigen Skylanders maken. Met de almachtige Senseis aan hun zijde zullen zij Skylands redden. - Ga op een episch nieuw avontuur - Gebruik de Imaginite Creation Crystals om je eigen Skylanders te maken - Sensei Skylanders zijn de ultieme meesters van de almachtige Sky Chi-krachten - Vecht en red Skylands met de Sensei en Imaginator Skylanders - Gebruik 10 verschillende soorten strijdklassen om Kaos en zijn hulpjes te verslaan - Speel samen met vrienden in coöp of race tegen ze - Speel splinternieuwe extra missies & minigames Wii-afstandsbediening, de

NZ.name: Skylanders Imaginators
NZ.description: Kaos has discovered the ancient power of Mind Magic and is using it to create an unstoppable army of Doomlanders! Now, you must use the power of your imagination to create your own Skylanders to battle in the ultimate adventure alongside the almighty Senseis to save Skylands. -Embark on an Epic New Adventure -Use the Imaginite Creation Crystals to Create Your Own Skylanders -Sensei Skylanders are the Ultimate Masters of the Almighty Sky-Chi Powers -Battle to Save Skylands with the Sensei and Imaginator Skylanders -Use 10 Different Battle Class Types to Defeat Kaos and his Minions -Play With Friends in COOP and Head-to-Head Racing -Conquer All-New Side quests & Mini-games This title cannot be played with the Wii Remote™ only.

PT.name: Skylanders Imaginators
PT.description: Kaos descobriu o poder antigo da Magia Mental e está usando ela para criar um exército irrefreável de Doomlanders! Eon está chamando todos os Mestres do Portal e os maiores guerreiros místicos das Skylands, o Senseis, para impedir Kaos e retomar o controle da Magia Mental. Agora você deve usar o poder de sua imaginação para criar seus próprios Skylanders e lutar na maior aventura ao lado dos poderosos Senseis para salvar as Skylands. - Embarque numa nova aventura épica - Use os Imaginite Creation Crystals para criar seus próprios Skylanders - Sensei Skylanders são os maiores mestres dos poderes de Sky-Chi - Lute para salvar as Skylands com os Senseis e os Imaginator Skylanders - Use 10 tipos de classe de batalha para derrotar Kaos e seus Lacaios - Jogue com amigos em cooperativo e Corrida Páreo a Páreo - Conquiste missões e minijogos inéditos Não é possível jogar esta aplicação utilizando apenas um Comando Wii.

RU.name: Skylanders Imaginators
RU.description: Каос обнаружил древнюю силу - Магию разума - и использует ее, чтобы создать непобедимую армию думлендеров! Эон созывает мастеров порталов и величайших мистических воинов Скайлендса, сэнсэев, чтобы остановить Каоса и вернуть контроль над Магией разума. Теперь вам предстоит использовать силу воображения и сотворить своих собственных скайлендеров, которые вместе со всемогущими сэнсэями отправятся на битву, чтобы спасти Скайлендс. - Отправляйтесь в новое увлекательное путешествие - Используйте кристаллы воображения, чтобы создавать собственных скайлендеров - Скайлендеры сэнсэи — это величайшие мастера могучих сил Скай-Чи - Отправляйтесь вместе с сэнсэями и скайлендерами воображения на битву, чтобы спасти Скайлендс - Используйте 10 различных боевых классов, чтобы одолеть Каоса и его приспешников - Играйте с друзьями в совместном режиме и режиме гонок - Одержите победу в мини-играх и выполните все дополнительные задания В эту игру невозможно играть только с пультом Wii.

SE.name: Skylanders Imaginators
SE.description: Kaos has discovered the ancient power of Mind Magic and is using it to create an unstoppable army of Doomlanders! Eon is calling upon all Portal Masters and Skylands' greatest mystic warriors, the Senseis, to stop Kaos and regain control of the Mind Magic. Now, you must use the power of your imagination to create your own Skylanders to battle in the ultimate adventure alongside the almighty Senseis to save Skylands. -Embark on an Epic New Adventure -Use the Imaginite Creation Crystals to Create Your Own Skylanders -Sensei Skylanders are the Ultimate Masters of the Almighty Sky-Chi Powers -Battle to Save Skylands with the Sensei and Imaginator Skylanders -Use 10 Different Battle Class Types to Defeat Kaos and his Minions -Play With Friends in COOP and Head-to-Head Racing -Conquer All-New Side quests & Mini-games This title cannot be played with the Wii Remote™ only.
